Library
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

Load Data
```{r}
copies<- read_csv(here("data", "processed_data", "clean_data_date.csv")) #This is the clean_data.csv from copies_calculator but with date manually added in,
```

Make mini dataframes for each site
```{r}
#Daily All Sites
daily<- copies %>%
  select(date,copies_mL,site,Type) %>%
  filter(Type %in% "Daily") %>%
drop_na() #Get rid of NAs


#Daily by Site
bo_daily <- daily %>% filter(site %in% "BO") #Blind Oso Bay
c2_daily <- daily %>% filter(site %in% "C2") #Canals
rd_daily <- daily %>% filter(site %in% "RD") #Gulf Site



```

Total Daily Vibrio at Gulf
```{r}
rd_daily %>%
  ggplot() +geom_line(
    aes(x = date,
        y = copies_mL),
    color = "darkblue") +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(
    x = "Date",
    y = "Copies/mL",
    title = "Total Daily Vibrio at Gulf Site") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
```

Total Daily Vibrio
```{r}
daily %>% ggplot()+geom_line(
  aes(x = date,
      y = copies_mL,
      color = site))+
  facet_wrap(~site) +
  theme_bw()+
  labs(
    x = "Date",
    y = "Copies/mL",
    title = "Total Daily Vibrio at all Sites") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + #center title
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) + #Tilt x axis labels 
  theme(legend.position = "none") #Removes legend 
```
